attributes.action: Introduce tags for long periods of time for prisioners.
attributes.additional_details: I want to Government and Parliament to do take more action on reducing repetative criminal offences and prevent further criminal offences. The general public will be safe and ex-offenders\ former prisioners will be monitored and they will be given guidance to improve and to better their lives.
attributes.background: The Government and Parliament should enforce restrictions on Prisioners as prisioners should wear a tag for longer periods of time (for example 3-5 years) after they prisioners are released from prision.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  The length of time someone is required to wear an electronic tag after release is set by the courts and probation service, not the UK Government or Parliament.
